```{asis, echo = {{covariate_model_knit}}, eval = {{covariate_model_knit}}, include = {{covariate_model_knit}}}
### Fit the covariate model
```

```{r, echo = {{covariate_model_knit}}, include = {{covariate_model_knit}}}

covariate_column <- {{covariate_model_covariate_column}}
covariate_name <- {{covariate_model_covariate_name}}

covariate_model <- suppress_jags_output(
  covariate_model(main_connected_data, treatment_df, outcome, outcome_measure,
                  covariate_column, covariate_name, {{covariate_model_covariate_value}}, 
                  model_type, {{covariate_model_regressor}}, reference_treatment_all))

```

```{r, echo = {{covariate_model_knit}}, include = {{covariate_model_knit}}}
covariate_model$dic |> 
  gt::gt(rownames_to_stub = TRUE) |>
  gt::tab_header(title = "Model fit for all studies") |>
  gt::tab_options(column_labels.hidden = TRUE) |>
  gt::fmt_number(rows = c(1:3), decimals = 3) |>
  gt::fmt_number(rows = 4, decimals = 0)
```
